ValidationRule.description: When Case status is close, Nature, Category, Status and Resolution can't be modified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( $User.BypassVR__c, LEFT($User.Id, 15) = LEFT($Setup.IconicsSettings__c.SystemUserId__c,15) ) ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed"), AND (RecordType.DeveloperName <> "SPAM", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Operation_Exception", RecordType.DeveloperName<> "Clienteling"), OR( ISCHANGED( Nature__c ), ISCHANGED( Status ), /*ISCHANGED( Resolution__c ),*/ ISCHANGED( Category__c ) ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Service and General Information' )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Resolution__c, 'Transfer to Headquarters' )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, 'Legal ( insurance, police, fraud)')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Case status is close, Nature, Category, Status and Resolution can't be modified.
